question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn left and go over the tress towards the drink ice gold. now turn right and go over between the buildings towards the brown building. now turn right and go over the buildings and cross the road towards the ash building. now turn right and get up and go over the buildings towards the ash building terrace. now turn right and turn back and go over the buildings and get down reach the ash building and stay there.]. You move according to a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is your best next step?  
choose:  
A. I turn right and go up.  
B. I turn right and fly forward.  
C. I fly forward while descending.  
D. I turn left and go up.  
E. I rotate the camera downward.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: Based on the navigation instruction, the next step after reaching the "brown building" is to turn right and go over between the buildings towards the ash building. The current position appears to be near the brown building, so turning right and flying forward aligns with the next part of the instruction to navigate between buildings.
